intro: Enothrea, commonly known as the silverleaf nightshade, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes tomatoes, potatoes, and tobacco. The plant features silver-tinted leaves and produces small, violet flowers that bloom in spring. Its fruits are berries that turn from green to red as they mature. Enothrea is often found in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to arid environments.
